revised_title: Cylindrically Symmetric Electrovac Solutions and Rotating Charged Dust
tldr: This article explores the relationship between rotating charged dust and cylindrically symmetric electrovac metrics in general relativity. The authors find that certain solutions can be matched smoothly to exterior electrovac solutions involving third Painleve transcendents, and that some solutions with a force-free electromagnetic field can be matched to a particular class of electrovac metrics.
